title: What hidden symmetry is controlling the Universe?
itunes:title: What hidden symmetry is controlling the Universe?
description:
Daniel and Jorge dive deep into quantum theory and explain gauge symmetry, the foundation of all modern physics.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
